paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants and penetrance data from the paper.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly, this case (PT0198) had previously been reported as negative for pathogenic variants in BRCA1 or BRCA2 as well as in MLH1, MSH2, MSH6 and PMS2.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as benign.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was found in one of the familial OC carrier cases.
key_quotes: Interestingly, this case (PT0198) had previously been reported as negative for pathogenic variants in BRCA1 or BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
